additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Maris Sal, Citric Acid, Butylene Glycol, Fucus Vesiculosus (Seaweed) Extract, CI 42090, CI 19140.

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: Made in Australia from local and imported ingredients

description: Coles Revitalise Ocean Breeze Body Wash has been carefully created with a refreshing and invigorating scent. Infused with sea minerals and seaweed extract, it will leave your skin feeling cleansed and hydrated. Dermatologically tested.
name: Revitalising Ocean Breeze Body Wash
